title: Retry build/deploy and force a fresh release version to recover missing Publish URL

requirements.text: Force a fresh deployment attempt by bumping the frontend build version string, then run build + deploy so Caffeine attempts a new publish and shows the Publish URL / “Open App” link.

quotes: coba sekali lagi di build dan deploy. mudah-mudahan server caffeine sudah tidak error. dan bisa menampilam URL nya. tapi jika gagal kita tunda dulu sampe besok.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/buildInfo.ts` BUILD_VERSION is incremented from its current value to a new value (e.g., v33) to trigger a new build artifact.
A new build+deploy is executed after the version bump.

The resulting Caffeine deploy output includes a visible Publish URL / “Open App” link; if it is still missing, record the deploy attempt outcome for follow-up (error message or confirmation that deploy succeeded but URL did not appear).

requirements.text: Add a short admin-facing note in the app (Admin Panel) explaining that if the Caffeine platform UI fails to show the Publish URL / “Open App” after a successful deploy, it is a platform issue and the team will pause and retry later, without implying an application bug.

quotes: tapi jika gagal kita tunda dulu sampe besok.

acceptanceCriteria: Admin Panel contains a concise English notice about the potential Caffeine deploy UI issue (missing Publish URL / Open App) and the plan to retry later if it happens.
The notice does not change any business logic and does not block normal app usage.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything in `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose instead).
Do not change backend logic as part of this request; this is a deploy retry and release bump only.
nonGoals: Implementing the previously discussed admin feature to delete a room along with its metadata (photo + description/price/type) is out of scope for this build request.
Fixing legacy room data/photo cleanup behavior is out of scope for this build request.
